creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top half of black velvet; bottom of blue damask; red silk border; large floral machine embroidery with varigated thread in pink, green, yellow; unlined but bottom half and back of border are stiffened; narrow black band around each section including ties
title: Apron
